Notes: 19th and 20th century letters, papers, college records, photographs, newspapers, and rare books; furniture, art objects, clothing and personal adornment, tools and equipment, metalwork, glass, pottery, and ceramics.  Collections in the Eubanks Gallery of the Welcome Center include natural history specimens, early American tools and household items, and Native American artifacts from Georgia.  Shorter history exhibits are on display in the lobby of the Welcome Center.
